abstract: Kosmos Energy, the U.S.-based oil explorer focusing on West Africa, ended its plans for a $4 billion sale of fields in Ghana to Exxon Mobil.
snippet: Kosmos Energy, the U.S.-based oil explorer focusing on West Africa, ended its plans for a $4 billion sale of fields in Ghana to Exxon Mobil.
lead_paragraph: Kosmos Energy, the American oil exploration company that is focusing on West Africa, ended its plans for a $4 billion sale of fields in Ghana to Exxon Mobil, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Kosmos Scuttles Plans for $4 Billion Sale
